name: Billy vs ClimateChange
description:
Climate change affects Billy ;(

The goal of this game is to adapt to the changing climate. 

Items can help Billy to adapt :) But pick them wisely ;)

Controls: W - up,  S - down.

Avatar shows the current status of Billy. If avatar blinks 'green' it improves Billy's survival ability and helps to adapt :) If avatar blinks 'red' then Billy's survival ability goes down :(
